channel.title: Group » List Of Members Of Blood, Sweat & Tears
channel.description: Group » List Of Members Of Blood, Sweat & Tears

item.title: Mike Stern
item.description: Mike Stern is an American jazz guitarist. After playing with Blood, Sweat & Tears, he worked with drummer Billy Cobham, then with trumpeter Miles Davis from 1981 to 1983 and again in 1985. He then began a solo career, releasing more than a dozen albums.

item.title: David Clayton-Thomas
item.description: David Clayton-Thomas is a Grammy Award-winning Canadian musician, singer, and songwriter, best known as the lead vocalist of the American band Blood, Sweat & Tears. Clayton-Thomas has been inducted into the Canadian Music Hall of Fame and in 2007 his jazz/rock composition 'Spinning Wheel' was enshrined in the Canadian Songwriter's Hall of Fame. In 2010 Clayton-Thomas received his star on Canada's Walk of Fame.

item.title: Steve Khan
item.description: Steve Khan is an American jazz guitarist.
